select SUBCOMPANYNAME as label,id,SUPSUBCOMID as pid , CONCAT(CONCAT(id,'_'),SUPSUBCOMID) as value,0 as is_sub from hrmsubcompany union all select departmentname as label,id,subcompanyid1 as pid , CONCAT(CONCAT(id,'_'),subcompanyid1) as value ,1 as is_sub from hrmdepartment where (canceled is null or canceled=0) and departmentname is not null and subcompanyid1 is not null and supdepid=0
AND departmentname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{departMentName}),'%')
union all select departmentname as label,id,supdepid as pid , CONCAT(CONCAT(id,'_'),subcompanyid1) as value,1 as is_sub from hrmdepartment where (canceled is null or canceled=0) and departmentname is not null and subcompanyid1 is not null and supdepid!=0
AND departmentname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{departMentName}),'%')

select t1.*,t2.departmentname from hrmresource t1 left join hrmdepartment t2 on t1.departmentid=t2.id where 1=1
AND t1.lastname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{lastname}),'%')
